suggestions.comments: - Do not include descriptive comments, ONLY those pointing that logic should be added or refactored, with commented out suggestions
suggestions.punctuation: - Always include trailing semicolons; - Do not include new lines for readibility only;
suggestions.statements: - For pairs of if/else blocks that lead to single statements in both cases, replace by ternary operators;
suggestions.imports: - Imports and exports should be sorted alphabetically in all depths
